title: Louis Vuitton Imagination
short_description: An ode to creativity and the boundless potential of the mind, Imagination is a citrusy and spicy fragrance with Calabrian bergamot, Chinese black tea, and Nigerian ginger. It evokes the limitless spark of ideas igniting in one’s soul, with a base of ambrox and olibanum bringing depth and modern sensuality.
